PawnShop.Title: Pawn Shoppe
PawnShop.Description: Th' pawn shoppe be a place where ye can sell yer booty fer doubloons.
PawnShop.TargetLabel: Parley with th' Pawn Shoppe Keeper
PawnShop.ShopClosed: Th' pawn shoppe be closed, matey!
PawnShop.PawnedDescription: Buy booty previously pawned t' th' shoppe.
PawnShop.SellDescription: Sell yer booty t' th' pawn shoppe fer quick doubloons.
PawnShop.NoStock: No booty be available at th' moment.
PawnShop.NoItemsToSell: Ye have no booty t' sell!
PawnShop.NoPawnedItems: No pawned booty be available fer purchase.

Smelting.SmeltingSuccess: Ye smelted th' booty down, aye!

LogMessages.PurchasedItem: %s purchased x %s %s fer $%s from th' pawn shoppe
